headline: Axon Enterprise's Software Revenues Accelerate: More Upside to Come?
summary: AXON's Software & Services segment jumps 39% in Q1 2025, fueled by premium add-on features upgrades and recurring revenue growth.

headline: Reflecting On Aerospace and Defense Stocks’ Q1 Earnings: Axon (NASDAQ:AXON)
